variable.name: case_control
variable.description: Affection status for CAMP, CARE and ACRN subjects. Subjects in CARE PEAK and AIMS protocols (Protocol=201 or 205) are classified as missing. Because of their young age, no diagnosis, comparable to older subjects which included symptoms and lung function assessment, was made for these subjects.

variable.name: consent_group
variable.value: Subjects did not participate in the study, did not complete a consent document and are included only for the pedigree structure and/or genotype controls, such as HapMap subjects.
Limited to biomedical genetic research solely in the area of asthma-related research (ARR)

variable.name: source_subjid
variable.description: Subject ID used in the Source Repository

variable.name: subj_source
variable.description: Source repository where subjects originate (CAMP, CARE, or ACRN studies)
